dist.spec 0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Define and manipulate probability distributions with potentially uncertain parameters

This package is an experimental spin-out from the EpiNow2 package.

Contributors

All contributions to this project are gratefully acknowledged using the allcontributors package following the all-contributors specification. Contributions of any kind are welcome!
